title: Breakout Pullback Entry
purpose: Enter on first pullback after breakout to EMA/VWAP with volume confirmation.
rationale: Use Donchian breakout to locate momentum and buy pullbacks to EMA/VWAP when volume remains healthy.

reading_guide.signal_logic: (close>donchian_upper_20) THEN wait for close near ema20 or vwap AND vol_z>0

beginner_summary: Enter after a breakout on the first pullback to EMA or VWAP with healthy volume.
assistant_hints: Confirm breakout with a close beyond range, not a wick.
Enter on first clean pullback to EMA/VWAP with support.
Avoid entries if volume dries up on the pullback.
Use stops below pullback swing or VWAP band; predefine risk.
